trans-unit.source: Represents an item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa um item no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: A RepeaterItem object represents an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control, such as the heading section, footer section, or a data item.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto RepeaterItem representa um item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>controle, como a seção de cabeçalho, rodapé seção ou um item de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: The data items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control are stored in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemCollection> object that can be accessed by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: Os itens de dados do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>controle são armazenados em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemCollection>objeto que pode ser acessado usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: You can use a RepeaterItem object to programmatically access the properties of an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar um objeto RepeaterItem para acessar as propriedades de um item de forma programática o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar e inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items*> collection of the control.
trans-unit.target: O índice do item no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> controlar do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items*>coleção do controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a data item associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um item de dados associado a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem"> </xref> objeto o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataItem property to specify or determine the properties of a data item associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade de item de dados para especificar ou determinar as propriedades de um item de dados associado a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem>objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property only applies to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade só se aplica a itens de dados a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A> property must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A>propriedade deve ser definida como `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, ou `ListItemType.EditItem`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that represents a data item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> que representa um item de dados no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items*> collection of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice do item no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> controlar do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items*>coleção do controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Use the ItemIndex property to determine the index number of the item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> collection of the control.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade ItemIndex para determinar o número de índice do item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>controlar do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A>coleção do controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property only applies to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade só se aplica a itens de dados a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A> property must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A>propriedade deve ser definida como `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, ou `ListItemType.EditItem`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items*> collection of the control.
trans-unit.target: O índice do item no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> controlar do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items*>coleção do controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo do item no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Use the ItemType property to determine the type of an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade ItemType para determinar o tipo de um item de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different item types.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista os tipos de item diferentes.

trans-unit.source: |Item Type|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |Header|The heading section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |Footer|The footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |Item|An item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |AlternatingItem|An alternating item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |SelectedItem|The selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |EditItem|The item selected for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |Separator|A separator between the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |Pager|The page selection section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.|
trans-unit.target: | Tipo de item | Descrição | |---------------|-----------------| | Cabeçalho | A seção de cabeçalho do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>. | | Rodapé | A seção de rodapé do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>. | | Item | Um item no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>. | | AlternatingItem | Um item de alternância no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>. | | SelectedItem | O item selecionado no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>. | | EditItem | O item selecionado para edição no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>. | | Separador | Um separador entre os itens do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>. | | Pager | Seção da página seleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>controle. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Assigns any sources of the event and its information to the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control, if the <xref:System.EventArgs> parameter is an instance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterCommandEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Atribui a qualquer fonte do evento e suas informações para o pai <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> de controle, se o <xref:System.EventArgs>parâmetro é uma instância de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterCommandEventArgs"> </xref>.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event assigned to the parent was raised, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o evento atribuído ao pai foi gerado, caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex*>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> instance is cast to the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem>instância é convertida para o <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemIndex*> property.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemIndex*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemIndex*>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex*>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> instance is cast to the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem>instância é convertida para o <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemIndex*> property.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemIndex*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemIndex*>
